text: The third reason is that the supreme interest for the whole world -East and West and uncommitted nations-is the prevention of nuclear war. A rapidly growing body of opinion in this country believes that Britain could be more effective in preventing a nuclear war as a neutral by helping to suggest agreements which could be accepted by both East and West.
handwritten_text: The third reason is that the supreme interest for the whole world -East and West and uncommitted nations-is the prevention of nuclear war. A rapidly growing body of opinion in this country believes that Britain could be more effective in preventing a nuclear war as a neutral by helping to suggest agreements which could be accepted by both East and West.
